column1: eLearning~ Watson Knowledge Studio Foundations and Methodology~ This course will familiarize you with end-to-end development of machine learning annotators utilizing Watson Knowledge Studio.

eLearning~ Advanced Machine Learning Models Using IBM SPSS Modeler (V18.2)~ This course presents advanced models available in IBM SPSS Modeler. The participant is first introduced to a technique named PCA/Factor
